text: Hi all, <https://www.juliadiff.org/seems> a little outdated, is there a better starting point to learn about AD in Julia?

elements.text: a little outdated, is there a better starting point to learn about AD in Julia?

text:
The ChainRules docs may be a better starting point 
<https://www.juliadiff.org/ChainRulesCore.jl/dev/|https://www.juliadiff.org/ChainRulesCore.jl/dev/>

Although they don't talk much about the many different Julia AD systems e.g. zygote, yota, nabla, reversediff, etc.

elements.text: The ChainRules docs may be a better starting point
Although they don't talk much about the many different Julia AD systems e.g. zygote, yota, nabla, reversediff, etc.

text: There are some notebooks by Mike Innes working through different approaches… ~~only I can’t find the link right now!~~ <https://github.com/MikeInnes/diff-zoo>
